snippet.title: The Walking Dead - The Final Season | OFFICIAL TRAILER
snippet.description:
"The first person who taught me about survival was Lee. He taught me how to say goodbye." The Walking Dead: The Final Season premieres August 14 on PlayStation 4, Xbox One, PC, and Nintendo Switch. Pre-orders available now!

SUBSCRIBE ► http://bit.ly/TelltaleSubscribe
